title: 72nd Annual Golden Globes Handed Out In Beverly Hills
teaser: The Golden Globes were handed out on Sunday night. "Grand Budapest Hotel" won best motion picture comedy/drama, and "Boyhood" won best dramas. "Transparent" was named best comedy or musical TV series. And, "The Affair" won best TV drama.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
